subject: Re: [junit] is there any way to log meessge in the repot
msgSnippet: What are you using to create the report? Ant? The Ant JUnit tasks logs all output to the xml test result files. You can adapt Ant s JUnitReport stylesheet
messageBody:
What are you using to create the report? Ant?

The Ant JUnit tasks logs all output to the xml test result files.
You can adapt Ant's JUnitReport stylesheet to include logging in your report.

Regards, Jan




________________________________
From: gaurangnshah <gaurangnshah@...>
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, February 28, 2011 8:48:38
Subject: [junit] is there any way to log meessge in the repot

 
HI Folks,

I would like to know if there is any way to log the message in the report as
there is in RerpotNG.
